original: @#/_/nor bdag gtsho 'khor lnga'i bstod🔽pa dbyig gi char 'bebs
analyzed: @#/_/nor bdag gtsho 'khor lnga'i bstod pa dbyig gi char 'bebs
translated: The Rain of Wealth: A Praise of the Five Cakravartins🔽The Praise of the Five Personal Deities

original: zhes bya ba/ ga_rje btshun lha lnga'i bstod pa bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar skad du/
analyzed: zhes bya ba/ ga_rje btshun lha lnga'i bstod pa bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar skad du/
translated: The Praise of the Five Personal Deities🔽In Sanskrit:🔽Vasupati-upadhyaya-pancha-stotra-vasu-megha-avesana-nama

original: ba su pa ti u pa d+h+ya pany+tsha stot+t+ra ba su me g+ha a be sha na ma/_bod skad du/_nor🔽bdag gtsho 'khor lnga'i bstod pa dbyig gi char 'bebs zhes bya ba/_'phags pa
analyzed: ba su pa ti u pa d+h+ya pany+tsha stot+t+ra ba su me g+ha a be sha na ma/_bod skad du/_nor bdag gtsho 'khor lnga'i bstod pa dbyig gi char 'bebs zhes bya ba/_'phags pa
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Rain of Wealth: A Praise of the Five Cakravartins🔽Homage to the noble Avalokiteshvara!

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/e ma/_'jig rten dbang phyug
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/e ma/_'jig rten dbang phyug
translated: Ema! The emanation of the body of Avalokiteshvara, the lord of wealth,

original: nor bdag sku sprul 'phags pa ni/_/gti mug rnam dag chos dbyings ye shes ngo
analyzed: nor bdag sku sprul 'phags pa ni/_/gti mug rnam dag chos dbyings ye shes ngo
translated: is the essence of the wisdom of the dharmadhatu, pure of ignorance,

original: bo nyid/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis dbu skra gyen rdzes nor bus brgyan/_/sha rgyas🔽bsus 'chang sna tshhogs dar gyi na bza' klubs/_/phyag g.yas be con 'dzin
analyzed: bo nyid/_/zhal gcig phyag gnyis dbu skra gyen rdzes nor bus brgyan/_/sha rgyas bsus 'chang sna tshhogs dar gyi na bza' klubs/_/phyag g.yas be con 'dzin
translated: with one face, two arms, hair tied up in a topknot, adorned with jewels,🔽with a full body, wearing various silken garments,🔽holding a club in the right hand, he brings the world under control,

original: pas 'jig rten dbang du sdud/_/g.yon pa ne'u le 'dzin pas longs spyod char
analyzed: pas 'jig rten dbang du sdud/_/g.yon pa ne'u le 'dzin pas longs spyod char
translated: and holding a mongoose in the left hand, he rains down enjoyments.

original: bzhin 'bebs/_/sku mdog dkar la dmar ba'i mdangs chags 'brug la🔽chibs/_/sna tshhogs rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/g.yon
analyzed: bzhin 'bebs/_/sku mdog dkar la dmar ba'i mdangs chags 'brug la chibs/_/sna tshhogs rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/g.yon
translated: You are mounted on a dragon with a white body and a reddish glow,🔽beautified by various precious ornaments.🔽Holding a vajra and khaṭvāṅga in the crook of your left elbow,

original: gyi gru mor rdo rje kha tam bsnams pa ni/_/nyid kyi sku la gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum
analyzed: gyi gru mor rdo rje kha tam bsnams pa ni/_/nyid kyi sku la gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum
translated: you are the supreme mother who is inseparable from your own body.

original: mchog mtshhon/_/spyan gsum khro gnyer cung zad bsdus pa zhi khro'i tshhul/_/yid
analyzed: mchog mtshhon/_/spyan gsum khro gnyer cung zad bsdus pa zhi khro'i tshhul/_/yid
translated: Your three eyes are slightly furrowed with wrathful frowns, the embodiment of peace and wrath.

original: la re ba'i 'bras bu byin la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/shar du zhe sdang rnam dag me
analyzed: la re ba'i 'bras bu byin la phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/shar du zhe sdang rnam dag me
translated: You bestow the results that fulfill one’s wishes.🔽To the east, the mirror-like pristine consciousness of the pure aspect of anger

original: long ye shes sku/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/
analyzed: long ye shes sku/_/rdo rje mkha' 'gro mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/
translated: is Vajraḍāka, blue-black, with one face and two hands.

original: g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa rten 'brel rdzas rnams 'dzin/_/bgegs rigs kun
analyzed: g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa rten 'brel rdzas rnams 'dzin/_/bgegs rigs kun
translated: The right hand holds a vajra, and the left holds the substances of interdependence.

original: 'joms rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/lho ru ser sna rnam dag mnyam
analyzed: 'joms rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/lho ru ser sna rnam dag mnyam
translated: You conquer all types of obstructors.🔽To the south, the pristine consciousness of uniformity of the pure aspect of avarice

original: nyid ye shes sku/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/
analyzed: nyid ye shes sku/_/rin chen mkha' 'gro ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/
translated: is Ratnaḍāka, yellow, with one face and two hands.

original: g.yas pa nor bu g.yon pa rin chen bum pa bsnams/_/dbyig gi char 'bebs
analyzed: g.yas pa nor bu g.yon pa rin chen bum pa bsnams/_/dbyig gi char 'bebs
translated: In her right hand she holds a jewel, in her left a precious vase,🔽and she showers down a rain of wealth.

original: rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/nub tu 'dod chags rnam dag kun
analyzed: rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/nub tu 'dod chags rnam dag kun
translated: I pay homage to Ratnaḍāka.🔽In the west, the wisdom body of the complete purification of desire,

original: rtog ye shes sku/_/pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/g.yas🔽pa pad+ma g.yon pa 'gugs byed lcags kyu bsnams/_/'gro rnams dbang bsdud pad+ma
analyzed: rtog ye shes sku/_/pad+ma mkha' 'gro dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/g.yas pa pad+ma g.yon pa 'gugs byed lcags kyu bsnams/_/'gro rnams dbang bsdud pad+ma
translated: is the red Lotusḍāka, with one face and two hands,🔽in her right hand a lotus, in her left an iron hook for summoning.🔽She magnetizes beings. I pay homage to Lotusḍāka.

original: mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/byang du phrag dog rnam dag bya sgrub ye shes sku/_/🔽las kyi mkha' 'gro ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/g.yas pa rgya gram g.yon pa
analyzed: mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/byang du phrag dog rnam dag bya sgrub ye shes sku/_/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/_/g.yas pa rgya gram g.yon pa
translated: In the north, the wisdom body of the accomplishment of jealousy,🔽is the green Karmaḍāka, with one face and two hands,🔽in her right hand a crossed vajra, in her left a mongoose pouch.

original: ne'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams/_/las kun 'grub byed sna tshhogs mkha' 'gro phyag🔽'tshhal bstod/_/ces mar me mdzad ye shes kyis nor bdag gtsho 'khor lnga zhal
analyzed: ne'u le'i rkyal pa bsnams/_/las kun 'grub byed sna tshhogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshhal bstod/_/ces mar me mdzad ye shes kyis nor bdag gtsho 'khor lnga zhal
translated: She accomplishes all activities. I pay homage to the various Karmaḍāka.🔽This is the praise by Dīpaṃkara Śrījñāna when he saw the five retinue

original: gzigs pa'i dus su bstod pa/
analyzed: gzigs pa'i dus su bstod pa/
translated: wealth deities.

original: rgya gar gyi pan+di ta chen po dang lo tsha ba chen po brtshon 'grus seng ges
analyzed: rgya gar gyi pan+di ta chen po dang lo tsha ba chen po brtshon 'grus seng ges
translated: The great Indian paṇḍita and the great translator, Lotsāwa Zhamar Chögyal Wange,

original: bsgyur ba'osna
analyzed: bsgyur ba'osna
translated: translated this.

original: nor bdag gtsho 'khor lnga'i bstod pa dbyig gi char 'bebs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: nor bdag gtsho 'khor lnga'i bstod pa dbyig gi char 'bebs zhes bya ba/
translated: The Rain of Jewels: A Praise of the Five Cakravartī Lords of Wealth
